title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The 'All types' dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes are displayed prominently in the 'All types' dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be displayed with less prominence in the 'All types' dialog.
SR: 1. Open the 'All types' dialog in JDK 1.4. 2. Observe the display of obfuscated classes. 3. Note the prominence of the obfuscated classes.
